verses.verse: ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe מֹרְאָ֖ה <S%H4754><s%> to her that is filthy וְנִגְאָלָ֑ה <S%H1351><s%> and polluted הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַיּוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3238><s%> to the oppressing

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> no שָֽׁמְעָה֙ <S%H8085><s%> She obeyed בְּק֔וֹל <S%H6963><s%> not the voice לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no לָקְחָ֖ה <S%H3947><s%> she received מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> not correction בַּֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> not in the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no בָטָ֔חָה <S%H982><s%> she trusted אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her אֱלֹהֶ֖יהָ <S%H430><s%> to her God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no קָרֵֽבָה׃ <S%H7126><s%> she drew not near

שָׂרֶ֣יהָ <S%H8269><s%> Her princes בְקִרְבָּ֔הּ <S%H7130><s%> within אֲרָי֖וֹת <S%H738><s%> lions שֹֽׁאֲגִ֑ים <S%H7580><s%> her [are] roaring שֹׁפְטֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H8199><s%> her judges זְאֵ֣בֵי <S%H2061><s%> wolves עֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> [are] evening לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nothing גָרְמ֖וּ <S%H1633><s%> they gnaw not the bones לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> till the morrow

נְבִיאֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5030><s%> Her prophets פֹּֽחֲזִ֔ים <S%H6348><s%> [are] light אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H582><s%> persons בֹּֽגְד֑וֹת <S%H900><s%> [and] treacherous כֹּהֲנֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3548><s%> her priests חִלְּלוּ־ <S%H2490><s%> have polluted קֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the sanctuary חָמְס֖וּ <S%H2554><s%> they have done violence תּוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> to the law

יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD צַדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> The just בְּקִרְבָּ֔הּ <S%H7130><s%> [is] in the midst לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> thereof he will not do עַוְלָ֑ה <S%H5766><s%> iniquity בַּבֹּ֨קֶר <S%H1242><s%> every בַּבֹּ֜קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning מִשְׁפָּט֨וֹ <S%H4941><s%> his judgment יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> doth he bring לָאוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> to light לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no נֶעְדָּ֔ר <S%H5737><s%> he faileth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יוֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth עַוָּ֖ל <S%H5767><s%> not but the unjust בֹּֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H1322><s%> no shame

הִכְרַ֣תִּי <S%H3772><s%> I have cut off גוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations נָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> are desolate פִּנּוֹתָ֔ם <S%H6438><s%> their towers הֶחֱרַ֥בְתִּי <S%H2717><s%> waste חֽוּצוֹתָ֖ם <S%H2351><s%> I made their streets מִבְּלִ֣י <S%H1097><s%> no עוֹבֵ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> that none passeth by נִצְדּ֧וּ <S%H6658><s%> are destroyed עָרֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5892><s%> their cities מִבְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> one אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> so that there is no man מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> that there is none inhabitant

אָמַ֜רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely תִּירְאִ֤י <S%H3372><s%> Surely thou wilt fear אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> תִּקְחִ֣י <S%H3947><s%> me thou wilt receive מוּסָ֔ר <S%H4148><s%> instruction וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִכָּרֵ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> should not be cut off מְעוֹנָ֔הּ <S%H4585><s%> den כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i פָּקַ֖דְתִּי <S%H6485><s%> I punished עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> concerning אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> them but הִשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <S%H7925><s%> they rose early הִשְׁחִ֔יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> [and] corrupted כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all עֲלִילוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H5949><s%> all their doings

לָכֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore חַכּוּ־ <S%H2442><s%> Therefore wait לִי֙ נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ye upon me saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> until the day קוּמִ֣י <S%H6965><s%> that I rise up לְעַ֑ד <S%H5706><s%> to the prey כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed מִשְׁפָּטִי֩ <S%H4941><s%> for my determination לֶאֱסֹ֨ף <S%H622><s%> [is] to gather גּוֹיִ֜ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations לְקָבְצִ֣י <S%H6908><s%> that I may assemble מַמְלָכ֗וֹת <S%H4467><s%> the kingdoms לִשְׁפֹּ֨ךְ <S%H8210><s%> to pour עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> on זַעְמִי֙ <S%H2195><s%> upon them mine indignation כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All חֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> [even] all my fierce אַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> anger כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed בְּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> with the fire קִנְאָתִ֔י <S%H7068><s%> of my jealousy תֵּאָכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> shall be devoured כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> for all the earth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> then אֶהְפֹּ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> For then will I turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> to the people שָׂפָ֣ה <S%H8193><s%> language בְרוּרָ֑ה <S%H1305><s%> a pure לִקְרֹ֤א <S%H7121><s%> that they may all call כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> upon the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְעָבְד֖וֹ <S%H5647><s%> to serve שְׁכֶ֥ם <S%H7926><s%> consent אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> him with one

מֵעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> From beyond לְנַֽהֲרֵי־ <S%H5104><s%> the rivers כ֑וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> of Ethiopia עֲתָרַי֙ <S%H6282><s%> my suppliants בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> [even] the daughter פּוּצַ֔י <S%H6327><s%> of my dispersed יוֹבִל֖וּן <S%H2986><s%> shall bring מִנְחָתִֽי׃ <S%H4503><s%> mine offering

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> no תֵב֙וֹשִׁי֙ <S%H954><s%> shalt thou not be ashamed מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> of all עֲלִילֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H5949><s%> for all thy doings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּשַׁ֖עַתְּ <S%H6586><s%> wherein thou hast transgressed בִּ֑י כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אָ֣ז ׀ <S%H227><s%> then אָסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> against me for then I will take away מִקִּרְבֵּ֗ךְ <S%H7130><s%> out of the midst עַלִּיזֵי֙ <S%H5947><s%> of thee them that rejoice גַּאֲוָתֵ֔ךְ <S%H1346><s%> in thy pride וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תוֹסִ֧פִי <S%H3254><s%> and thou shalt no more לְגָבְהָ֛ה <S%H1361><s%> be haughty ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H6944><s%> because of my holy

וְהִשְׁאַרְתִּ֣י <S%H7604><s%> I will also leave בְקִרְבֵּ֔ךְ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> of thee an afflicted וָדָ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> and poor וְחָס֖וּ <S%H2620><s%> and they shall trust בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <S%H7611><s%> The remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יַעֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall not do עַוְלָה֙ <S%H5766><s%> iniquity וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יְדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> nor speak כָזָ֔ב <S%H3577><s%> lies וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> be found בְּפִיהֶ֖ם <S%H6310><s%> in their mouth לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue תַּרְמִ֑ית <S%H8649><s%> neither shall a deceitful כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יִרְע֥וּ <S%H7462><s%> for they shall feed וְרָבְצ֖וּ <S%H7257><s%> and lie down וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> and none shall make [them] afraid ס

רָנִּי֙ <S%H7442><s%> Sing בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הָרִ֖יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> shout יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel שִׂמְחִ֤י <S%H8055><s%> be glad וְעָלְזִי֙ <S%H5937><s%> and rejoice בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> with all the heart בַּ֖ת <S%H1323><s%> O daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

הֵסִ֤יר <S%H5493><s%> hath taken away יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִשְׁפָּטַ֔יִךְ <S%H4941><s%> thy judgments פִּנָּ֖ה <S%H6437><s%> he hath cast out אֹֽיְבֵ֑ךְ <S%H341><s%> thine enemy מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [even] the LORD בְּקִרְבֵּ֔ךְ <S%H7130><s%> [is] in the midst לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִֽירְאִ֥י <S%H3372><s%> will fear רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> more

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> it יֵאָמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> it shall be said לִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֑אִי <S%H3372><s%> Fear צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> thou not [and to] Zion אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִרְפּ֥וּ <S%H7503><s%> be slack יָדָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H3027><s%> Let not thine hands

יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהַ֛יִךְ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּקִרְבֵּ֖ך <S%H7130><s%> in the midst גִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> of thee [is] mighty יוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H3467><s%> he will save יָשִׂ֨ישׂ <S%H7797><s%> he will rejoice עָלַ֜יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> over בְּשִׂמְחָ֗ה <S%H8057><s%> over thee with joy יַחֲרִישׁ֙ <S%H2790><s%> he will rest בְּאַ֣הֲבָת֔וֹ <S%H160><s%> in his love יָגִ֥יל <S%H1523><s%> he will joy עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> over בְּרִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> over thee with singing

נוּגֵ֧י <S%H3013><s%> [them that are] sorrowful מִמּוֹעֵ֛ד <S%H4150><s%> for the solemn assembly אָסַ֖פְתִּי <S%H622><s%> I will gather מִמֵּ֣ךְ <S%H4480><s%> about הָי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מַשְׂאֵ֥ת <S%H4864><s%> of it [was] a burden עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <S%H2781><s%> [who] are of thee [to whom] the reproach

הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> I am going עֹשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> I will undo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְעַנַּ֖יִךְ <S%H6031><s%> all that afflict בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> Behold at that time הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> I וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּ֣י <S%H3467><s%> thee and I will save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּלֵעָ֗ה <S%H6760><s%> her that halteth וְהַנִּדָּחָה֙ <S%H5080><s%> her that was driven out אֲקַבֵּ֔ץ <S%H6908><s%> and gather וְשַׂמְתִּים֙ <S%H7760><s%> and I will get לִתְהִלָּ֣ה <S%H8416><s%> them praise וּלְשֵׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> and fame בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in every land בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ <S%H1322><s%> where they have been put to shame

בָּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> I אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> will I bring אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וּבָעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> you [again] even in the time קַבְּצִ֣י <S%H6908><s%> that I gather אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed אֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> you for I will make אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> you a name וְלִתְהִלָּ֗ה <S%H8416><s%> and a praise בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> among all people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth בְּשׁוּבִ֧י <S%H7725><s%> when I turn back אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁבוּתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H7622><s%> your captivity לְעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> before your eyes אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
